title: For the administrative services set at CAPAMA, it charges the following fees:

tbody.t1: Issuance of proof of feasibility of potable water and sewerage services
Issuance of Certificate of debt or no debt
Authorization of construction projects for internal network of potable water and sewerage
Leak detection of water or sewage inside the building
Checking of measuring devices reported as broken or damaged
Cleaning of septic tanks and sludge disposal by M3
Authorization of diameter reduction of water intakes
Procedure to change data from user´s registry
Changes of measuring devices within the property (it does not include material)
Breaking of concrete per linear meter due to installation of water intakes
Sewage discharges by vessels and boats to dock tax collectors for M3.
For the reception of wastewater for its treatment in CAPAMA plants by M3
For the measuring devices to be replaced by breakdown, or damage, in all sizes and for all uses, provided the damage is not attributable to the user.
tbody.t2: 50% of the cost of the new meter

tbody.t1: For physico-chemical analysis to be done in the laboratories of the CAPAMA
For Physico-Chemical analysis by tank car or tank of sewage water discharged in CAPAMA’s plants
For administrative efforts to collect for half inch water intakes (equipment not included )
For administrative efforts to collect for .750 inch water intakes (equipment not included).
For administrative efforts to collect for 1,000 inch water intakes (equipment not included).
For administrative efforts to collect for higher than an inch water intakes (equipment not included)
For termination or suspension procedures.
For new meters 1 / 2 in for popular service.
For new mechanical meters 1 / 2in service for Residential, Commercial, Public and Markets.
For new radio frequency meters 1 / 2in service for Residential, Commercial, Public and Markets.
For new 3 / 4in Radio Frequency meters .
For new 3 / 4in mechanic meters.
For new 1in meters
For new 1 1 / 2in meters
For new 2in meters
For new 2 1 / 2in meters
For new 3in meters
For new 4in meters
For new 6in meters
Review of blueprints for authorization of projects for housing or condominiums developments
For supervision of the construction of internal networks of drinking water supply and sewerage, you will be charged for every 1,000 pesos of investment.
Issuance of Historical consumption and user payments, for the last 5 years
By connecting a water intake derived for commercial use within the same property and with different commercial business, up to 5mt of pipeline (excluding the meter).
By connecting a water intake derived for commercial use within the same property and with different commercial business, up to 10mt of pipeline (excluding the meter.
